name: Game Audio
description: Read-only tools for searching requirements, Wwise projects, and Unity projects.

roots.description: Allowed root directories the audio tools can read.

id.description: Stable root id (e.g. requirements, wwise, unity).

kind.description: Optional hint: requirements | wwise | unity | other.

exclude.description: Per-root exclude patterns (substring match on normalized paths).

maxFileBytes.description: Max bytes read from any one file (default 2000000).

maxHits.description: Max total matches returned per search (default 200).

followSymlinks.description: If true, follow symlinks during traversal (default false).

exclude.description: Global exclude patterns (substring match on normalized paths).

includeExtensions.description: If set, only read files with these extensions (e.g. .cs, .wwu, .xml).
